pain_point_copy: Off-the-shelf healthcare software treats your work like any other pharmacy operation—ignoring decay calculations, hot lab protocols, and the split-second precision that defines radiopharmacy. You've adapted generic tools with workarounds and spreadsheets, but the software was never built for someone who thinks in half-lives.
solution_copy: We've crafted something different. Purpose-built protocols that understand F-18's 110-minute reality. Decay calculations that feel like second nature. Compliance tracking that respects USP 797 and 800 without the checkbox tedium. This isn't healthcare software adapted for radiopharmacy—it's radiopharmacy excellence, refined into form.

title: Mass Spectrometry Field Service Engineers
headline: Precision Isn't Found. It's Crafted.
subheadline: Purpose-built tools for the engineers who keep the world's most sensitive instruments running—without the generic bloat you don't need.
pain_point_copy: Every app claims it's built for 'field service.' But they weren't thinking about you when they designed it. They don't understand quad collision cells, ion sources that drift, or the difference between preventive calibration and emergency repair. You spend more time forcing their square-peg software into your round-hole reality than you do actually documenting your work. The tools should adapt to your craft—not the other way around.
solution_copy: We built something different. Something tailored. Tools designed specifically for the precision work you do—from ion optics alignment to vacuum system troubleshooting. Every field, every workflow, every report template speaks your language. No bloat. No compromises. Just the refined essentials that help you document faster, diagnose smarter, and get back to what you do best: keeping mass spec systems running at peak performance.
